specialRules.name: Angelic Aura
specialRules.label: Angelic Aura
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick 2 friendly units within 6”, which get Fearless next time they take a morale test.

specialRules.hint: The hero gets +D3 to its rolls when trying to block spells.
specialRules.name: Angelic Shield
specialRules.label: Angelic Shield
specialRules.description: The hero gets +D3 to its rolls when trying to block spells.

specialRules.hint: When the hero and his unit are activated pick one of the following orders, and they get one of these special rules until the end of the round: • Double Time: +3” when moving.
specialRules.name: Commander
specialRules.label: Commander
specialRules.description: When the hero and his unit are activated pick one of the following orders, and they get one of these special rules until the end of the round: • Double Time: +3” when moving.

specialRules.hint: Whenever this unit moves over enemies pick one of them and roll 3 dice, for each 2+ it takes 2 hits with AP(1).
specialRules.name: Embers
specialRules.label: Embers
specialRules.description: Whenever this unit moves over enemies pick one of them and roll 3 dice, for each 2+ it takes 2 hits with AP(1).

specialRules.hint: Whenever this unit moves over enemies pick one of them, and that unit gets -1 to its hit rolls next time it fights in melee.
specialRules.name: Frost
specialRules.label: Frost
specialRules.description: Whenever this unit moves over enemies pick one of them, and that unit gets -1 to its hit rolls next time it fights in melee.

spells.name: Terrify
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -1 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Thunder
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Star Chains
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 18” moves -6” next time it charges.

spells.name: Lightning
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(3).

spells.name: Shock Speed
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Storm
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 8 automatic hits each.
